name: Red Rose Bouquet
description: Classic dozen red roses arranged with baby's breath and greenery. Perfect for romantic occasions.

name: Mixed Spring Arrangement
description: Colorful spring mix with tulips, daffodils, and hyacinths in a ceramic vase.

name: White Lily Sympathy Bouquet
description: Elegant white lilies with eucalyptus, appropriate for sympathy and remembrance.

name: Sunflower Happiness Bunch
description: Bright sunflowers with orange gerbera daisies to bring sunshine to any day.

name: Purple Orchid Plant
description: Beautiful purple phalaenopsis orchid in decorative pot, long-lasting and elegant.

name: Birthday Celebration Mix
description: Vibrant mix of roses, carnations, and alstroemeria in bright, cheerful colors.

name: Pink Peony Seasonal Special
description: Gorgeous pink peonies available during season (May-June), absolutely stunning.

name: Small Succulent Garden
description: Assorted small succulents arranged in a modern geometric planter.
